info.title: Time Frack 3D
info.author: ThatOtherPerson
info.details:
A 3D game with time controls. You can slow down and even reverse time.

Controls:
Pointer = Aim
Analog stick = Move
C button = Jump
Z button = Crouch
+ button = speed up time
- button = slow down time

Author:
ThatOtherPerson (thatotherperson@yahoo.com)
ThatOtherDev.com
